full_threads.body: New page for Website
Thanks Heath

Hi Jaqui, 


Confirming the page has now been added to the main menu. 


Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire Joao Henriques Manuel Manceli  Cool!
Joel Maligalig Heath Maguire Manuel Manceli Well done!!
Heath Maguire done linking the new page on the menu :)
Joel Maligalig Joao Henriques Check out Manuel... 💪💪😃
Manuel Manceli yes please! Well done! Your first task on Intercom!

Perfect thanks

Hi Jaqui, 


Sure we updated for you, here is the link: https://wolper.com.au/professionals/credentialing/ 


Let us know what you think? 


Thanks,
Manuel Manceli thanks!
ok now update Heath Maguire

Hi Heath


Thankyou for doing this so quickly. The first sentence shouldn’t be bold. It should look like the next sentence. Also now that you have included the button for the application form we don’t need to have a link on the words Application for Approval.


Thanks
Help Heath understand how they’re doing:

Hi Jaqui, 


The page has been created and added to the site. Here is the link for you to check: https://wolper.com.au/professionals/credentialing/ 


Once we know you are happy with it, we will add it to the main menu as requested. 


Thanks and speak soon,
ok now Heath Maguire can you check it please and let me know? https://wolper.com.au/about-us/important-contacts/credentialing/
New page for Website
New page for Website

Manuel Manceli this is for the wolper.com.au site. Can you please read the client requirement above and create the new page. You can use the same design as one of the other pages on the site that will work well with this content. Thanks!

Hi Jaqui,


Sure will do and send you a message when it’s ready today.


Thanks and speak soon,
New page for Website

Hi Heath

Can you please add a Page under ‘For Professionals’.

We currently have

Ø Referring a Patient

Ø Order Brochures

Ø Important Contacts

Can you please add ‘Credentialing’ as another page underneath Important Contacts

On this new Credentialing page can you please have the following:

If you would like to apply for accreditation at Wolper Jewish Hospital, you need to complete our APPLICATION FOR APPROVAL – Visiting Medical Practitioner (VMP) or non-medical Visiting Practitioner (VP) form. (This is a hyperlink, I have already uploaded the form to the Media Library))

Wolper Jewish Hospital’s By-Laws aim to ensure that all patients admitted to the Hospital receive appropriate care and to ensure a high level of professional performance by all practitioners authorised to practise in the Hospital.

Download the By-Laws here. (I have already uploaded the bylaws to the Media Library)

Many thanks

Jaqui


Jaqui Herman

Operations Assistant

Wolper Jewish Hospital

E: jaquiherman@wolper.com.au 8 Trelawney Street

T: 02 8324 2237 F: 02 9327 5973 Woollahra NSW 2025
